meanings.definition: A mythical creature used to frighten children.
meanings.sent1: The children whispered about the boogiemen hiding in their closets.
meanings.sent2: Parents often mention the boogiemen to make kids behave.
meanings.sent3: The siblings joked about the boogiemen under the bed, trying to scare each other.
meanings.sent4: The idea of boogiemen lurking in the shadows can represent our deepest fears.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the boogiemen were defeated by the brave young hero.

meanings.definition: A source of fear or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The dark forest was a place full of boogiemen for the timid explorer.
meanings.sent2: The upcoming exam was the boogiemen that kept the students up at night.
meanings.sent3: The thought of spiders was a boogiemen for the arachnophobic girl.
meanings.sent4: Failure can sometimes become the boogiemen that haunts our dreams.
meanings.sent5: The boogiemen of uncertainty clouded his mind before the big decision.
